item.title: Level Up Your Gaming Life With One Move You Won’t Regret
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/level-up-your-gaming-life-with-one-move-you-wont-regret/1100-6527375/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

If you’re a PC player looking to take your experience to the next level, it’s time to talk about PC Game Pass.

For just $13.95 a month, your PC Game Pass subscription opens the door to a massive library of high-quality games — including major day-one releases like Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, and Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, as well as exclusive perks you won’t want to miss.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 needs no introduction, promising to deliver the intense gameplay and engaging narratives fans expect from this blockbuster franchise, making it a must-play for FPS enthusiasts.

Meanwhile, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is set to elevate your virtual flying experience with stunning graphics and realistic environments, perfect for aviation enthusiasts and cosy gamers.

For adventure lovers, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle offers an exciting ride that brings the beloved character back to life, allowing players to immerse themselves in new thrilling quests.

Your subscription also comes with EA Play, giving you access to a treasure trove of popular EA games and exclusive discounts — like 20% off select titles and 10% off add-ons, meaning more games for less cash, letting you expand your library without breaking the bank.

If you’re into League of Legends or Valorant, linking your Riot Games account to your PC Game Pass will unlock some awesome in-game rewards that can really boost your gameplay.

For League of Legends players, you’ll gain access to all of the game’s Champions right from the start. Valorant fans will benefit from unlocking Agents, which can enhance your team composition and strategy. You’ll also score XP boosts, allowing you to climb the ranks faster and unlock even more rewards.

If you're looking to level up your gaming setup, subscribing to PC Game Pass opens the door to an unparalleled library of games and exclusive benefits.

This is the upgrade you won’t want to miss--and certainly won't regret.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
